textAfterTable: Listener comments!   Wed. 10/24/12 7:01pm steve: hey lamin! pumped to hear some Basic Channel   Wed. 10/24/12 7:07pm northguineahills: Basic Channel!!!!!   Wed. 10/24/12 7:17pm /rupture: soundin' good   Wed. 10/24/12 7:24pm northguineahills: Have you heard of Buddy Pipp (aka George Williams). He was a SL Krio-Ghanaian drummer in the post-skiffle 1950s London jazz scene. He teamed up w/ Joe Harriot when he was experimenting w/ his nascent free-jazz developments, before returning to SL & Ghana. I think he still occasionally does radio in Accra, now. Wed. 10/24/12 7:31pm lamin:
